name: Revenge of the Wannabees Quiz | Harrison, Lisi | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
popsicles.

	Oatmeal was her food obsession in the book "The Clique."  Go-gurt is her food obsession in the book "The Pretty Committee Strikes Back."

questions.text: Who is in Alicia's Pretty Committee?
questions.explanation:
Olivia, Kori, Strawberry.

	Olivia is Alicia's second in command.  Alicia recruited Strawberry and Kori to replace Kristen and Dylan.

questions.text: Who does Alicia think she has a date with?
questions.explanation:
Harris.

	She thinks she is going to a Strokes concert with Harris until he told her that he invited his friend Angela to go with him.

Faux-livia.

	She calls Olivia Faux-livia because everything Olivia wears is fake.

false.

	Dean is the Riveras' family driver.

questions.text: Who does the school announcements through most of the book?
questions.explanation:
Deena Gyser.

	In the end, Deena decides to do other stuff, so Alicia does the school announcements.

questions.text: Why doesn't Massie finish her spray tan?
questions.correct: she gets mad after Alicia calls her
questions.explanation:
she gets mad after Alicia calls her.

	Alicia calls Massie to tell her that she and Olivia are modeling for Teen People.

questions.text: Catherine is the girl in Alicia's dance class who wants a makeover.
questions.explanation:
false.

	Meredith is the girl in Alicia's dance class that wants a makeover.

questions.text: Who does Claire usually eat lunch with?
questions.explanation:
Layne, Meena, and Heather.

	After the photo shoot, Massie lets Claire eat lunch with her, Kristen, Alicia, and Dylan.
